block.p: Recent Sale $4.01 million 270 Bleecker Street (also known as 2-4 Morton Street) Manhattan A real estate investor has bought this 18-foot-wide 3,900-square-foot, four-story building with a restaurant, a hair salon and three residential units in Greenwich Village. Buyer: Kenneth Birnbaum Seller: Patricia McKenna Brokers: Brendan Gotch and James Nelson, Massey Knakal Realty Services

Recent Lease $36/sq. ft. approximate annual rent $582,000 53 West 23rd Street Manhattan An office products company has taken a 10-year lease for 16,155 square feet on the 10th floor of this 1917 building in the Flatiron district.
Tenant: W. B. Mason Landlord: Twenty-Three R. P. Associates Broker: David Levy, Adams & Co.

For Lease $36/sq. ft. approximate annual rent $137,600 99 Wall Street Manhattan The entire 18th floor, covering 3,822 square feet with views, is available with a 5- to 10-year lease in this renovated 25-story office building. Owner: Claremont Group Brokers: Brad Gerla, Adam Foster and Michael Higgins, CB Richard Ellis
